original_text: Very few people will remain after my punishment. Men and women will be more difficult to find than the best gold.
korean_text: 내가 사람을 순금보다 희소하게 하며 인생을 오빌의 금보다 희귀하게 하리로다

sentences.original_text: Very few people will remain after my punishment
sentences.korean_translation: 내 벌을 받은 후에는 아주 적은 사람만 남을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Men and women will be more difficult to find
sentences.korean_translation: 남자와 여자를 찾는 것이 더 어려울 것이다
